column4: !ops | AnonMasochist ( refuses to listen and repeatedly asked the same question) please quiet him
that isn't a reason to call a channel emergency.
stands to reason that he may just be a bot, he doesn't acknowledge anything we say

if he's not then he's trolling, i mean come on he asked the same thing 20 times said other users reported the error and then gave no further information, hasn't acknowledged much of what anyone has said
